plot outline: The story revolves around 6 music enthusiastic children from a village who group themselves to form a music band. After being separated for a couple of years while pursuing their graduation they reunite at the same college for post-graduation where they get to meet a group of troublesome seniors. Conventionally, the seniors try to dominate them and forms a bitter full scene. While moving on with life and coping up with studies, romance and other subjects of life, one among the six is found missing and other mates get puzzled.They choose to decode the riddle and their further journey structures the film.
title: Oru Caribbean Udayippu
plot: The story revolves around 6 music enthusiastic children from a village who group themselves to form a music band. After being separated for a couple of years while pursuing their graduation they reunite at the same college.

The story revolves around 6 music enthusiastic children from a village who group themselves to form a music band. After being separated for a couple of years while pursuing their graduation they reunite at the same college for post-graduation where they get to meet a group of troublesome seniors. Conventionally, the seniors try to dominate them and forms a bitter full scene. While moving on with life and coping up with studies, romance and other subjects of life, one among the six is found missing and other mates get puzzled.They choose to decode the riddle and their further journey structures the film.::whitepaper
synopsis:
" OKU - Oru Karribean Uddaippu "
The film will be produced by RVK Nair under the banner of "Karthikeyan Cinemas"
The story revolves around 6 music enthusiastic children from a village who group themselves to form a music band. After being separated for a couple of years while pursuing their graduation they reunite at the same college for post graduation where they get to meet a group of troublesome seniors. Conventionally, the seniors try to dominate them and forms a bitter full scene. While moving on with life and coping up with studies, romance and other subjects of life, one among the six is found missing and other mates get puzzled.They choose to decode the riddle and their further journey structures the film.
Sudani Fame Samuel Abiola Robinson, Vishnu Vinay, Anish Menon ,Vishnu Govind, Rishi Prakash, Nandan Unni , Mekha Mathew, Marina Micheal and Niharika are the main characters in the movie which is directed by A JoJi, which is a picture of " OKU - Oru Karribean Uddaippu"
Sreejith Ravi, Dinesh Panicker, Devan, Kochu Preman, Kottayam Pradeep, Chandradasan, Kalabhavan Joshi, Mustafa, Altaf, Ryan, Aji, Joji, Parvathy, Shali Prajith, Amrita, Singer Arundhathi, Jassi Gift, Shinto Irinkalakuda, JoJi Jose, Aji Jose and other prominent stars.
Director Of Photography : Venugopal
The music Directors: 4 Musics and Charu Hariharan.
Songs written by: BK Harinarayan.
C0-Producers- Rajesh and Reshma,Production Controller - Rajan Philip,Art-Nathan Mannoor, Makeup-Sudhakar, Costumes- Bineesh Kakkodi, Stills-Lijo Kunjappan, Editor-Sandeep Kumar, Sound Desiner-Rajesh PM,DI Colorist-Shanmuga Pandian,Studio-Chalachitram,Associate Director -Arati Shaji, Assistant Director -Ratheesh, Vipin, Shyam Prem , Ryan, Biju, Dance Master- Rekha Master,Kaushya Master, Action-Jackie Johnson, Finance Controller-Aji Jose, Production Manager- Anil Chalakudy, Aji Jose, Production Executive Shinto Irinkalakuda, PRO-A.S.Dinesh,Designs-Collins Leophil, Distributor-Karthikeyan Cinemas Release.
